body: I discussed this with @zou3519 earlier on another PR. I think we reached the conclusion that resizeAs gives contiguous tensor if the tensor was actually resized, so this call is needed if a resize didn't happen. However, this call could potentially be unnecessary if gradInput is always resized, or guaranteed to be contiguous if it is the correct size.
